verses.verse: On <S%G2250><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> out of <S%G575><s%> the house <S%G3614><s%>, and sat <S%G2521><s%> by <S%G3844><s%> the sea side <S%G2281><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> there were gathered unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> multitudes <S%G3793><s%>, so that <S%G5620><s%> he <S%G846><s%> entered <S%G1684><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a boat <S%G4143><s%>, and sat <S%G2521><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3793><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the beach <S%G123><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he spake <S%G2980><s%> to them <S%G846><s%> many things <S%G4183><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> parables <S%G3850><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Behold <S%G2400><s%>, the sower <S%G4687><s%> went forth <S%G1831><s%> to sow <S%G4687><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G1722><s%> he <S%G846><s%> sowed <S%G3303><s%>, some <S%G3739><s%> seeds fell <S%G4098><s%> by <S%G3844><s%> the way side <S%G3598><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the birds <S%G4071><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> devoured <S%G2719><s%> them <S%G846><s%>:

and others <S%G243><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the rocky places <S%G4075><s%>, where <S%G3699><s%> they had <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> straightway <S%G2532><s%> they sprang up <S%G1816><s%>, because <S%G1223><s%> they had <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> deepness <S%G899><s%> of earth <S%G1093><s%>:

and <S%G1161><s%> when the sun <S%G2246><s%> was risen <S%G393><s%>, they were scorched <S%G2739><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> they had <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> root <S%G4491><s%>, they withered away <S%G3583><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> others <S%G243><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the thorns <S%G173><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the thorns <S%G173><s%> grew up <S%G305><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> choked <S%G638><s%> them <S%G846><s%>:

and <S%G2532><s%> others <S%G243><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the good <S%G2570><s%> ground <S%G1093><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> yielded <S%G1325><s%> fruit <S%G3303><s%>, some <S%G3739><s%> a hundredfold <S%G1161><s%>, some <S%G3739><s%> sixty <S%G1161><s%>, some <S%G3739><s%> thirty <S%G5144><s%>.
He that hath <S%G2192><s%> ears <S%G3775><s%>, let him hear <S%G191><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G4334><s%>, and said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G1223><s%>, Why <S%G5101><s%> speakest thou <S%G2980><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> parables <S%G3850><s%>?

And he answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Unto you <S%G5213><s%> it is given <S%G1325><s%> to know <S%G1097><s%> the mysteries <S%G3466><s%> of the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> to them <S%G1565><s%> it is <S%G1325><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> given <S%G1325><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> whosoever <S%G3748><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%>, to him <S%G846><s%> shall be given <S%G1325><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> he shall have abundance <S%G4052><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> whosoever <S%G3748><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>, from <S%G575><s%> him <S%G846><s%> shall be taken away <S%G142><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> which he hath <S%G2192><s%>.

Therefore <S%G5124><s%> speak I <S%G2980><s%> to them <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> parables <S%G3850><s%>; because <S%G3754><s%> seeing <S%G991><s%> they <S%G991><s%> see <S%G991><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> hearing <S%G191><s%> they hear <S%G191><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>, neither <S%G3761><s%> do they understand <S%G4920><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> them <S%G846><s%> is fulfilled <S%G378><s%> the prophecy <S%G4394><s%> of Isaiah <S%G2268><s%>, which saith <S%G3004><s%>, By hearing <S%G189><s%> ye shall hear <S%G191><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shall <S%G4920><s%> in <S%G3756><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> wise understand <S%G4920><s%>; And <S%G2532><s%> seeing <S%G991><s%> ye shall see <S%G991><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shall <S%G1492><s%> in no <S%G3361><s%> wise perceive <S%G1492><s%>:

For <S%G1063><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> people <S%G2992><s%>'s heart <S%G2588><s%> is waxed gross <S%G3975><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> their ears <S%G3775><s%> are dull of <S%G917><s%> hearing <S%G191><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%> they have closed <S%G2576><s%>; Lest haply <S%G3379><s%> they should perceive <S%G1492><s%> with <S%G3788><s%> their eyes <S%G3788><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> hear <S%G191><s%> with <S%G3788><s%> their ears <S%G3775><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> understand <S%G4920><s%> with <S%G3775><s%> their heart <S%G191><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> should turn again <S%G1994><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> I should heal <S%G2390><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> blessed <S%G3107><s%> are your <S%G5216><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%>, for <S%G3754><s%> they see <S%G991><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> ears <S%G3775><s%>, for <S%G3754><s%> they hear <S%G191><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> righteous <S%G1342><s%> men <S%G1492><s%> desired <S%G1937><s%> to see <S%G1492><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> ye see <S%G1492><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> them not <S%G3756><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> to hear <S%G191><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> ye hear <S%G191><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> them not <S%G3756><s%>.
Hear <S%G191><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> the parable <S%G3850><s%> of the sower <S%G4687><s%>.

When any one <S%G3956><s%> heareth <S%G191><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of the kingdom <S%G932><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> understandeth <S%G4920><s%> it not <S%G3361><s%>, then cometh <S%G2064><s%> the evil <S%G4190><s%> one <S%G2532><s%>, and snatcheth away <S%G726><s%> that which hath been sown <S%G4687><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%>. This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> he that was sown <S%G4687><s%> by <S%G3844><s%> the way side <S%G3598><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he that was sown <S%G4687><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the rocky places <S%G4075><s%>, this <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> he that heareth <S%G191><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> straightway <S%G2117><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> receiveth <S%G2983><s%> it <S%G846><s%>;

yet <S%G1161><s%> hath he <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> root <S%G4491><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> endureth <S%G2076><s%> for a while <S%G4340><s%>; and when <S%G1161><s%> tribulation <S%G2347><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> persecution <S%G1375><s%> ariseth <S%G1096><s%> because of <S%G1223><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%>, straightway <S%G2117><s%> he stumbleth <S%G4624><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G4687><s%> that was sown <S%G4687><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> the thorns <S%G173><s%>, this is <S%G2076><s%> he <S%G3778><s%> that heareth <S%G191><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the care <S%G3308><s%> of the <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G165><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the deceitfulness <S%G539><s%> of riches <S%G4149><s%>, choke <S%G4846><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> he becometh <S%G1096><s%> unfruitful <S%G175><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he that was sown <S%G4687><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G1093><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> ground <S%G1093><s%>, this is <S%G2076><s%> he <S%G3778><s%> that heareth <S%G191><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> understandeth <S%G4920><s%> it <S%G3739><s%>; who verily <S%G1211><s%> beareth fruit <S%G2592><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> bringeth forth <S%G3303><s%>, some <S%G3739><s%> a hundredfold <S%G1161><s%>, some <S%G3739><s%> sixty <S%G1161><s%>, some <S%G3739><s%> thirty <S%G5144><s%>.

Another <S%G243><s%> parable <S%G3850><s%> set he before <S%G3908><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, The kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is likened unto <S%G3666><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> that sowed <S%G4687><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> seed <S%G4690><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> field <S%G68><s%>:

but <S%G1161><s%> while <S%G1722><s%> men <S%G444><s%> slept <S%G2518><s%>, his <S%G846><s%> enemy <S%G2190><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sowed <S%G4687><s%> tares <S%G2215><s%> also <S%G303><s%> among <S%G3319><s%> the wheat <S%G4621><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> went away <S%G565><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> the blade <S%G5528><s%> sprang up <S%G985><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> brought forth <S%G4160><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%>, then <S%G5119><s%> appeared <S%G5316><s%> the tares <S%G2215><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the servants <S%G1401><s%> of the householder <S%G3617><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Sir <S%G2962><s%>, didst <S%G4687><s%> thou not <S%G3780><s%> sow <S%G4687><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> seed <S%G4690><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> thy <S%G4674><s%> field <S%G68><s%>? whence <S%G4159><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> hath it <S%G2192><s%> tares <S%G2215><s%>?

And he said <S%G5346><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, An enemy <S%G2190><s%> hath <S%G444><s%> done <S%G4160><s%> this <S%G1161><s%>. And the servants <S%G1401><s%> say <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Wilt thou <S%G2309><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> that we go <S%G565><s%> and gather <S%G4816><s%> them <S%G846><s%> up <S%G4816><s%>?

But <S%G1161><s%> he saith <S%G5346><s%>, Nay <S%G3756><s%>; lest <S%G3379><s%> haply while ye gather up <S%G4816><s%> the tares <S%G2215><s%>, ye root up the <S%G1610><s%> wheat <S%G4621><s%> with <S%G260><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

Let <S%G863><s%> both <S%G297><s%> grow together <S%G4885><s%> until <S%G3360><s%> the harvest <S%G2326><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the time <S%G2540><s%> of the harvest <S%G2326><s%> I will say <S%G2046><s%> to the reapers <S%G2327><s%>, Gather up <S%G4816><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> the tares <S%G2215><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> bind <S%G1210><s%> them <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> bundles <S%G1197><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> burn <S%G2618><s%> them <S%G846><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> gather <S%G4863><s%> the wheat <S%G4621><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> barn <S%G596><s%>.

Another <S%G243><s%> parable <S%G3850><s%> set he before <S%G3908><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, The kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> like unto <S%G3664><s%> a grain <S%G2848><s%> of mustard seed <S%G4615><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> took <S%G2983><s%>, and sowed <S%G4687><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> field <S%G68><s%>:

which <S%G3739><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> less <S%G3398><s%> than all <S%G3956><s%> seeds <S%G4690><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> it is grown <S%G837><s%>, it is <S%G2076><s%> greater <S%G3173><s%> than the herbs <S%G3001><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> becometh <S%G1096><s%> a tree <S%G1186><s%>, so that <S%G5620><s%> the birds <S%G4071><s%> of the heaven <S%G3772><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> lodge <S%G2681><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the branches <S%G2798><s%> thereof <S%G846><s%>.

Another <S%G243><s%> parable <S%G3850><s%> spake he <S%G2980><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>; The kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> like unto <S%G3664><s%> leaven <S%G2219><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> took <S%G2983><s%>, and hid <S%G1470><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> measures <S%G4568><s%> of meal <S%G224><s%>, till <S%G2193><s%> it <S%G3739><s%> was all <S%G3650><s%> leavened <S%G2220><s%>.

All <S%G3956><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> spake <S%G2980><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> parables <S%G3850><s%> unto the multitudes <S%G3793><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> a parable <S%G3850><s%> spake he <S%G2980><s%> nothing <S%G3756><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>:

that <S%G3704><s%> it might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> which was spoken <S%G4483><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the prophet <S%G4396><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, I will open <S%G455><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> parables <S%G3850><s%>; I will utter <S%G2044><s%> things hidden <S%G2928><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> he <S%G2424><s%> left <S%G863><s%> the <S%G863><s%> multitudes <S%G3793><s%>, and went <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the house <S%G3614><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Explain <S%G5419><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%> the parable <S%G3850><s%> of the tares <S%G2215><s%> of the field <S%G68><s%>.
And he answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%>, He that soweth <S%G4687><s%> the good <S%G2570><s%> seed <S%G4690><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%>;

and the field <S%G68><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the world <S%G1161><s%>; and the good <S%G2570><s%> seed <S%G4690><s%>, these <S%G3778><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> the sons <S%G5207><s%> of the kingdom <S%G932><s%>; and the tares <S%G2215><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> the sons <S%G5207><s%> of the evil one <S%G4190><s%>;

and the enemy <S%G2190><s%> that sowed <S%G4687><s%> them <S%G846><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the devil <S%G1161><s%>: and the harvest <S%G2326><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the end <S%G4930><s%> of the world <S%G165><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> the reapers <S%G2327><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> angels <S%G32><s%>.

As <S%G5618><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> the tares <S%G2215><s%> are gathered <S%G4816><s%> up and <S%G2532><s%> burned <S%G2618><s%> with fire <S%G4442><s%>; so <S%G3779><s%> shall it be <S%G2071><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the end <S%G4930><s%> of the <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G165><s%>.

The Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> shall send forth <S%G649><s%> his <S%G846><s%> angels <S%G32><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they shall gather <S%G4816><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things that cause stumbling <S%G4625><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> them that do <S%G4160><s%> iniquity <S%G458><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> shall cast <S%G906><s%> them <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the furnace <S%G2575><s%> of fire <S%G4442><s%>: there <S%G1563><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> the weeping <S%G2805><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the gnashing <S%G1030><s%> of teeth <S%G3599><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> shall <S%G1584><s%> the righteous <S%G1342><s%> shine forth <S%G1584><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the sun <S%G2246><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of <S%G3962><s%> their <S%G846><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%>.
